Allen Iverson scored a season-high 51 points but the Lakers had three players, led by Kobe Bryant 's 25, score 20-plus points to give the Lakers a 111-107 win over the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday night. Carmelo Anthony had 26 points and eight rebounds and Marcus Camby had 20 rebounds for the Nuggets. "We absorbed a lot of points from Allen Iverson , Lakers coach Phil Jackson said. "He got our whole team in foul trouble." Allen Iverson scored 49 points through the first three quarters but was held to a just a layup in the fourth. The Lakers

These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth-- investments that will benefit our users, Google and the wider web.
